title: How TO - Add a Favicon in HTML

content_sections.title: Introduction
content_sections.content: How TO - Add a Favicon in HTML

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to add a favicon in HTML. How To Add a Favicon in HTML A favicon is a small image displayed You can use any image you like as your favicon. You can also create your own favicon on sites like https://favicon.cc . Tip: A favicon is a small image, so it should be a simple image with high contrast. A favicon image is displayed to the left of the page title in the browser tab, like this: To add a favicon to your website, either save your favicon image to the root directory of your webserver, or create a folder in the root directory called images, and save your favicon image in this folder. A common name for a favicon image is "favicon.ico". element to your "index.html" file, after the element, like this: Example <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>My Page Title

This is a Heading

This is a paragraph.

Now, save the "index.html" file and reload it in your browser. Your browser tab should now display your favicon image to the left of the page title. ★ +1
